resources.string: If you\'re enjoying and gaining numerous knowledge in Educare a few spare coins in your pockets can help a lot by watching a few ads and subscribing to our premium account. You can help the school in giving their students the best experience to learn in this pandemic.
We would like to express our profound gratitude to the following contributors: Bantayan Science High School, and Banscie Supreme Student Government.
We would like to express our profound gratitude to the Algobty Team

The Educare is an app that is used in helping students understand and learn their lessons more efficiently without the worry of being left behind and failing a certain subject. Educare also encourages students to continue learning despite the fact that there is pandemic. This also teaches students to cope up with the new normal.
